text: Star Wars Rebels is a Canadian 3D CGii animated series produced by 9 Story Media Group Lucasfilm and Lucasfilm Animation. It is set 14 years after Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith and 5 years before Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope. The visual style of Star Wars Rebels is heavily inspired by the original Star Wars trilogy concept art by Ralph McQuarrie. The series premiered on October 3, 2014 on Disney Channel, with a movie special, titled Star Wars Rebels: Spark of Rebellion. ==Episodes== ===Shorts=== Adapted from books turned in to short one minute to promote the series and made available online. No. Title Date Code 1 The Machine Ghost August 11, 2014 101A 2 Art Attack August 18, 2014 101B 3 Engagement August 25, 2014 101C 4 Property of Ezra Bridger September 1, 2014 101D ===Season One (2014-15)=== No. overall No. in season Title Date Code 1 1 Spark of Rebellion October 3, 2014 102-103 2 2 roids in Distress October 13, 2014 104 3 3 Fighter Flight October 20, 2014 105 4 4 Rise of the Old Masters October 27, 2014 106 5 5 Breaking Ranks November 3, 2014 107 6 6 Out of Darkness November 10, 2014 108 7 7 Empire Day November 17, 2014 109 8 8 Gathering Forces November 24, 2014 110 9 9 Path of the Jedi December 1, 2014 111 10 10 Idiot's Array December 8, 2014 112 11 11 Vision of Hope December 15, 2014 113 12 12 Call to Action December 22, 2014 114 13 13 Rebel Christmas December 25, 2014 115 14 14 Rebel Resolve February 23, 2015 116 15 15 Fire Across the Galaxy March 2, 2015 117 ===Season Two=== Lucasfilm and Disney have confirmed a second season. No. overall No. in season Title Date Code 16 1 The Siege of Lothal June 20, 2015 201-202 17 2 Heating Malfunction June 27, 2015 203 18 3 The Lost Commanders October 14, 2015 204 19 4 Relics of The old Republic October 21, 2015 205 ==Release== ===Broadcast=== Disney XD (US) CBBC (UK) ABC (Australia) France 5 (France) Disney Channel (Spain Italy and Latin America) TVO (Canada) TV12 (Singapore) EBS (Korea) Kids 1 (South Korea) M-Net (South Africa) Cartoon Network (India and Pan Asia) CyBC (Cyprus) MiniMini+ (Poland) POP TV (Slovenia) MBC E Vision and Al Jazeera (Middle East) YLE (Finland) NRK (Norway) Lativi (Indonesia) TVNZ (New Zealand) Cartoon Gang and True Vision (Thailand) VBC (Vietnam) TV3 (Malaysia) RTE (Ireland) RTB (Brunei) Hop TV (Israel) Canal Panda (Portugal) ===Home media=== Star Wars Rebels: Spark of Rebellion was made to DVD on retailers that came including character shorts, plush toy and prievew of season one. ==Reception== ===Ratings=== The one hour special garnered 2.743 million viewers in the United States, the second most on the network that night. Worldwide, it delivered a total of 6.5 million viewers. ===Critical reception=== At Metacritic, which assigns a normalised rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream critics, the album has received an average score of 78, based on 4 reviews indicating "generally favorable reviews". IGN and Variety in particular had strong praise for the pilot movie, Spark of Rebellion, but their only real criticism was the appearance of the Wookiees in the film, being cited as not all that impressive compared to the rest of the animation. ==References== Category:American science fiction television series Category:American children's television series Category:Disney Channel television series Category:Star Wars television series
title: Star Wars Rebels
